Evil/Good Tech Notice
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Techs/Tech Chains: Evil/Good Tech Notice
By Kurasu Soratobu on Thursday, December 21, 2000 - 05:05 pm:

The SO has been raising a Zuum for techniques. At one point, he noticed that all the spots were at 'Learning may be difficult', and so didn't worry about it. In the meantime, he let his critter go from Neutral to Evil, so as to get the Zuum's evil techs. Imagine his surprise when, after just that one small change, the tech went from 'May be difficult' to easy to get: Dust Cloud. A Zuum evil tech.

This makes me wonder: can all techs that are 'only' gotten at evil/good be possibly gotten at Neutral, as well? Only with great difficulty? An interesting quandry.

And for that matter: when it says 'may be difficult', how many people have actually gotten one? I'm positive I did it _once_. Only once, though.

By Petit-Trot on Thursday, December 21, 2000 - 08:17 pm:

It never happenned to me. I thought it meant I hadn't met the requirement needed for the tech to have (chain, evil/good).
